{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [0] describes a study where CMB305 was used in combination with atezolizumab for the treatment of patients with synovial sarcoma or myxoid liposarcoma. Although the combination did not result in significant increases in progression-free survival or overall survival compared with atezolizumab alone, some patients demonstrated evidence of an anti-NY-ESO-1 immune response and appeared to fare better. This suggests that CMB305 can be used against sarcomas, but further evaluation is needed.", "answer_choice": "A"}
